testcase.name: Validation Multiple Details with Purchase Flight
testcase.system-out: Given I select source_city from dropdown and destiny_city from dropdown.....passed When I click on FindFlights button..........................................passed Then I Validate Navigation to Purchase Page.................................passed When I Enter username as "SunkaraRam" and Address as "Dmm" and City as "ATP" and State as "AP" and Zipcode as "1234" and CardTyep as "Visa" and CCNumber as "78922" and Month as "3" and Year as "2021" and NameofCard as "Ram S".passed Then I will get Id of the flight and store it into txt file.................passed
